Sqls.Sql: UPDATE ModelData SET FieldA=:FieldA, FieldB=:FieldB, FieldC=:FieldC, FieldD=:FieldD, FieldE=:FieldE, FieldF=:FieldF, FieldG=:FieldG, FieldH=:FieldH WHERE Id=:Id
INSERT INTO ModelData(Id, FieldA, FieldB, FieldC, FieldD, FieldE, FieldF, FieldG, FieldH) VALUES(:Id, :FieldA, :FieldB, :FieldC, :FieldD, :FieldE, :FieldF, :FieldG, :FieldH)
